items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: It is so soft and very good quality. I am taking this to London with me and will be perfect Read more
items.author: Rhonda Galvin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great piece!
items.body: Very very pleased with this purchase! Read more
items.author: Mrs. H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: Just what I wanted. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute Cardigan!
items.body: I'm impressed with the quality of the fabric. It's heavy, soft and looks classy! It will wear well with a cute black dress for a dressy look for the holidays. It's very stylish with nice deep pockets and a cute collar that folds down nicely and doesn't wad up. The length is just above my knee, you can wear it with jeans, dress pants and black tights with long boots for this winter. Very versatile cardigan you'll appreciate having in your wardrobe closet! Read more
items.author: S.D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Long, Fits Well
items.body: This throwover is perfect for the upcoming cool weather! It's still warm where I live, but I've already tried this on with a few outfits. The material is really soft, the fit is great (even for wider shoulders), and it is tall girl friendly! It's the perfect length. The only thing I will say is that the material seems like it sheds easily, as I already have little hairs and fuzzies left on the clothes from this, so definitely something to keep in mind. Read more
items.author: Rachel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Stylish, and Perfect for Work
items.body: This vest is soft, comfortable, and has a polished look that makes it perfect for wearing to work. The plaid design adds a bit of personality without being too bold, and the fit is flattering while still cozy. Great layering piece for the office or casual outings. Read more
items.author: KRM_88

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Good!
items.body: Yes, yes, yes! I absolutely love this sweater! It is a perfect length for cool weather wear. It so soft, I did not want to take it off. The fabric is very soft and thick, so I know it is a good quality! I also love the colors and how easy it was to layer! I wore it out for the day, but could be styled for work as well. Love this! Read more
items.author: Billie Jo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and comfy
items.body: I absolutely love this plaid sweater vest! The material is soft and warm without feeling too heavy, making it perfect for layering over long sleeve tops or turtlenecks in the fall and winter. The length hits just right — long enough to give a flattering silhouette but not overwhelming. The open front design makes it easy to throw on, and the pockets are a huge plus for keeping my hands warm or holding my phone. The plaid pattern looks classic and stylish, and the quality feels really nice for the price. I’ve gotten several compliments every time I wear it. Definitely a wardrobe staple! Read more
items.author: Bcloutier

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
